articles.author: Shivam Shukla
articles.title: Stock Market Today: Top 10 things to know before the market opens - Moneycontrol
articles.description: The SGX Nifty indicates a positive start for the broader index with a gain of 40 points on Tuesday with the Wall Street ending higher, European markets throwing up mixed trends, and Asian indices showing bullish trading
articles.content: The market is likely to open marginally higher on Tuesday as the SGX Nifty indicates a positive start for the broader index with a gain of 40 points after opening the session at 18,250. SGX futures t… [+5040 chars]
